article_title: The real reason for Punch Pizza’s high wages

article_metadata.description: Two years ago, St. Paul-based Punch Neapolitan Pizza’s strategic initiative to raise wages struck many in the industry as a stunt. Since then, though, the nine-unit chain has raised wages further, and the effort has been much chronicled and lauded, including by President Obama during his 2014 State of the Union address.

og.description: If Punch Neapolitan Pizza’s higher-wage initiative has been good for business, why isn’t the rest of the local restaurant trade following?
og.title: The real reason for Punch Pizza’s high wages
